Junior in Computer Science
 dylangwight@gmail.com

\ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.
\ 
\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.

In the first phase, select the longest scrambled word you can find in each grid. You will get to keep the letters you use in the second phase. You can clear your current word by clicking on a selected tile. 

 In the second phase, make words by selecting letters in different grids. You will score points for each word you add. Rarer letters are worth more points!
I used www.stackoverflow.com and http://developer.android.com for genral java and android help. I tried to use www.androiddesignpatterns.com/2012/05/using-newinstance-to-instantiate.html to pass arguments into Fragments/Activities. The Background image and the sounds are taken from the Ultimate Tictactoe game.

Food Grouper Start Reading Click to start reading in your food items including the quantity. For example, 5 apples, 2 cartons of eggs, etc. Listening... Food Grouper Diet Sort Dictate This Month Last Month All Trickiest Part Add Servings Grain Veg Fruit Protein Dairy Fat Month Week Day Mon Tues Wed Thur Fri Sat Sun Target Food Grouper will help make your diet healthier and more balanced by tracking the amount of each food group you eat each day. It will take in information about how many servings of each type of food you ate and give you a percentage breakdown of how your diet compares to the recommended diet. By tracking servings rather than calories or specific foods, Food Grouper makes tracking your food intake quick and painless. Food Grouper also offers customizable prompts throughout the day to remind you to track your food as well as a customizable target diet. No matter what your goals are, Food Grouper will help you to achieve them! We would like to acknowledge the following resources for helping to make Food Grouper the app that it is! 

Graphs: https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart, Overall programming questions: http://stackoverflow.com/, Recommended diet information: http://www.newhealthguide.org/The-Eatwell-Plate-Percentages.html, Icon: http://www.choosemyplate.gov/ Food Grouper will help make your diet healthier and more balanced by tracking the amount of each food group you eat each day. It will take in information about how many servings of each type of food you ate and give you a percentage breakdown of how your diet compares to the recommended diet. By tracking servings rather than calories or specific foods, Food Grouper makes tracking your food intake quick and painless. Food Grouper also offers customizable prompts throughout the day to remind you to track your food as well as a customizable target diet. No matter what your goals are, Food Grouper will help you to achieve them! 	Three times a day, you'll be automatically be reminded to estimate how many servings of each food group you've eaten. We will track your entries and compare your diet breakdown to your target diet.
	You can make additional food entries anytime you want. Your target diet and reminder times can be adjusted in Settings. 
 Get Started Welcome to Food Grouper! Add Entry + - Add Servings
